ygData.subject: Re: Regarding the Oaken Scimitar.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have one, its stats are as follows: An Oaken Scimitar 1H Slashing Dmg: 7   Delay: 26 WIS: +-9 Weight: 2.0 Classes: DRU Races: HFL, ELF, HEF, HUM Will accept
ygData.messageBody:
I have one, its stats are as follows:
An Oaken Scimitar
1H Slashing
Dmg: 7 Delay: 26
WIS: +-9
Weight: 2.0
Classes: DRU
Races: HFL, ELF, HEF, HUM
Will accept TRADES ONLY+ACE- Preferably a magic item.. mage oriented.

From: Warthog warthog+AEA-ooz.net
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com+AD4AOw- EQDruids+AEA-onelist.com EQDruids+AEA-onelist.com+AD4AOw- Tunare Mailing List TunareEQ+AEA-onelist.com

Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Regarding the Oaken Scimitar.


From: Warthog warthog+AEA-ooz.net

Alright, one person on The Druid's Grove (a
href+AD0AIg-http://206.86.100.18:8080/BBSMessageBoard.showBoard?boardName+AD0-thedruidsgrove+ACIAPg-http://206.86.100.18:8080/BBSMessageBoard.showBoard?boardName+AD0-thedruidsgrove/a)
claims to have the Scimitar, but isn't fessing up. I need this darn
sword, I'm level 20 with a 17 skill in two handed blunt +ACo-grin+ACo-. Anyone
have ANYTHING on it?
